title: Huntsman.The.Orphanage.Update.v1.01-RELOADED
description:
nERv


          Huntsman: The Orphanage Update v1.01 (c) ShadowShifters

      11/2013 :..... RELEASE.DATE .. PROTECTION .......: Steam
            - :.......... DISC(S) .. GAME.TYPE ........: Action, Adventure


Check the included .txt file for a list of whats new.

--

MORE STORY THAN GORY! A HYBRID OF ALTERNATIVE HORROR AND CREEPYPASTA...
Welcome to the Halloween Edition!
Take a deep breath, dim the lights, put on your headphones...

Non-linear first-person gameplay lets you explore Grimhaven Orphanage and
discover the characters who once lived there   voiced by Dan Bull, Chuck
Huber and Raychul Moore, plus a multitude of other great voices from around
the world - some of which we discovered through our globalauditions!

We call this alt horror because it has no graphic violence, blood or
guns. As the player, you have no defense... however, you must show empathy
and courage to save the twelve missing orphans. This is a game for people
who like to explore, listen, think and solve - and play cat and mouse in a
dark and scary maze. Listen to the nineteen personal creepypasta-style
stories to piece together the mysterious events of that fateful night in
1898, when twelve orphans simply... disappeared! Now with shorter
(30-60 sec) in-game stories to enhance the tension and new plot twists when
you least expect them! And dont panic story lovers! The full stories are
still there   on the menu page and somewhere within the game... if you know
where to look!!

Find the twelve orphans mementos and place them on the correct headstones
to set the lost souls free. Did we mention the headstones are in a hedge
maze? Custom-created by a Ripleys Believe-It-Or-Not Maze Master? No
problem! But first youll have to find the key... Are you up to the
challenge? Did we mention the Huntsman... in the maze... stalking you? Did
we mention he may also be lurking in Grimhaven Orphanage?

So   how fast can you turn and run? Well you wont know till you check it
out! So go do it! Have fun!! Scare yourself as much as you want (maybe you
should keep the hallway light on...!)


1. Unrar
2. Install the update.
3. Copy over the cracked content from the /Crack directory on the image to
   your game  directory
4. Play the game.
5. Support the software developers. If you like this game, BUY IT!
